â€¦there are large WordPress events around the world where enthusiasts meet and learn from each other?

Conferences like WordCamp Europe, WordCamp US, and WordCamp Asia bring the global WordPress community together in person.

These events feature talks, workshops, and networking opportunities for everyone from beginners to seasoned developers.
